content: * during the victorian era orchid symbolism shifted to luxury and today this sense of magnificence and artful splendor continues with orchids representing rare and delicate beauty * golden orchids is an elegant shawl to wrap around your neck its shape is semi-circular a modified triangle and it s knitted from the center of neck outwards the beads on the border adds a little hint of luxury and sparkle the lace motif in the border chart has a blooming orchid motif which was specially designed for this project **gauge** 12 stitches and 25 row = 4 or 10 cm in leaves pattern **finished size** 160 cm 70 inches across by 58 cm 25 inches down **materials** 410 yards 375 meters of fingering weight yarn size 6 beads optional the total amount of beads needed is 108 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/butterfly-kiss
